message.entry: Pivot threshold argument is only supported when input matrix is sparse.
Pivot threshold argument must be between 0 and 1, inclusive.
Pivot threshold argument must be a scalar or a vector of length 2.
Invalid data type. First argument must be double or single.
Invalid data type. The pivot threshold must be double or single.
Pivot threshold must be a scalar when three outputs are specified.
Too many input arguments. For dense input matrices, you can specify one or two input arguments.
Fourth output only available for sparse input matrices.
